resume.title: Resume Generator
resume.subtitle: Create a professional resume in minutes

placeholders.awardSummary: Recognized for exceptional performance and leadership in delivering critical projects...

buttons.uploadJsonHint: Upload a JSON file in Resume Schema format
buttons.generatePdfHint: Open PDF generation and download options

descriptions.personalInfo: Add your basic contact information and professional details
descriptions.profiles: Add your social media and professional network profiles
descriptions.work: Add your professional work history and achievements
descriptions.workExperience: Describe your roles, responsibilities, and key achievements for each position. Focus on impact and results.
descriptions.volunteer: Add your volunteer work and community contributions
descriptions.education: Add your academic background and relevant courses
descriptions.awards: Add your awards, honors, and professional recognitions
descriptions.certificates: Add your professional certificates and licenses
descriptions.publications: Add your published articles, papers, and books
descriptions.skills: Add your technical skills and areas of expertise
descriptions.languages: Add the languages you speak and your proficiency levels
descriptions.interests: Add your hobbies and personal interests
descriptions.projects: Add your personal and professional projects

empty.profiles: No profiles have been added yet. Click the button above to add your first profile.

validation.email: Must be a valid email address
validation.dateRange: End date must be after start date
validation.minContent: Resume must have at least one of: work experience, education, or skills
validation.minSkills: At least one skill is required
validation.content_required: Please add at least one section (work experience, education, or skills) to generate your resume

errors.title: Error
errors.rate_limit_exceeded: Too many requests. Please wait {seconds} seconds before trying again.
errors.pdf_generation_timeout: PDF generation timed out. Please try again with simpler content.
errors.pdf_generation_error: Error generating PDF. Please try again.
errors.template_rendering_error: Error rendering template. Please verify your data.
errors.validation_error: Please correct the errors in the form.
errors.invalid_resume_data: Resume data is invalid. Please verify required fields.
errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

form.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all form data?

validationError.title: Validation Error
validationError.description: Please check all required fields and ensure they are valid.

saveError.title: Error
saveError.description: Failed to save resume. Please try again.

pdfSuccess.title: PDF Generated
pdfSuccess.description: Your resume has been generated successfully!

pdfError.title: Generation Failed
pdfError.description: Failed to generate PDF. Please try again.

formCleared.title: Form Cleared
formCleared.description: All form data has been reset.

loading.please_wait: This will only take a moment

preview.empty_state: Start filling out the form to see your resume preview

messages.noDataPreview: Start filling out the form to see your resume preview
messages.fillResumeFirst: Please fill in some resume information first.
messages.saveSuccessDescription: Your resume has been saved successfully.
messages.exportSuccessDescription: Your resume has been downloaded as resume.json
messages.exportFailedDescription: Please fix validation errors before exporting.
messages.importSuccessDescription: Your resume has been loaded successfully.
messages.savedMinutesAgo: Saved {count} min ago | Saved {count} mins ago
messages.savedHoursAgo: Saved {count} hour ago | Saved {count} hours ago
messages.savedDaysAgo: Saved {count} day ago | Saved {count} days ago

resetDialog.title: Reset form?
resetDialog.description: This will clear all resume data from the form and storage. This action cannot be undone. Make sure to download your resume first if you want to keep it.

pdfPage.title: Generate PDF
pdfPage.selectTemplate: Select a template to generate preview
pdfPage.unablePreview: Unable to display PDF preview. Please download to view.
